name: Spam Simulator ~ Spam 'em Up!
description:
Submitted for the "Use the Enemies to Win" game jam, made sloppily in roughly 5 and a half hours.

Mr. A, the magic policeman, is out to foil your master's plan for world domination. Show your devotion as your master's army general, by deploying your units "strategically".

Sounds are ripped straight from the Touhou games.
BGM used: A Soul as Red as a Ground Cherry

Staff:
Alpherisk - "Programmer", "Artist"
